data.oai_dc:dc: The base KTU Pinophyta contains over 1716 records (specimens) representing Divisio (Phylum): Pinophyta. This collection originates mainly from Poland (97%), a smaller part of collection was collected in various parts of the world (3%). The greatest part of the polish collection documents botanic scientific researchers from Silesian University and includes materials from the areas where the research has been conducted – Upper Silesia (72%) and adjacent regions (22%), a smaller part are specimens from another territory of Poland (6%).|1,716 occurrences
